solution_line_template: In a week, Elliot will read {pages_per_day} x {days_in_week} = <<{pages_per_day}*{days_in_week}={pages_read_in_week}>>{pages_read_in_week} pages.
Adding the prior readings, he has read a total of {pages_already_read} + {pages_read_in_week} = <<{pages_already_read}+{pages_read_in_week}={total_pages_read}>>{total_pages_read} pages.
There are {total_pages_in_book} - {total_pages_read} = <<{total_pages_in_book}-{total_pages_read}={pages_left_to_read}>>{pages_left_to_read} pages still left to be read.
